subject: Order SSN4229 - Urgent - black baseplate missing from package
description_text:
Good evening, given your response time and to answer my questions as
efficiently as possible, could you please tell me how soon you can send me
the footrest in black?

And if it takes longer than 10 days, can you refund me without negotiation?
Your item is available within 10 days at the same price as on your Amazon
website. It's a Christmas gift, so please understand the urgency.
Thank you.[image:
IMG_4437.jpg][image: IMG_4438.jpg]

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 8425 中
